Parameters.Name: RECORDING-2-1-21 START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - PUT JOB IN IDLE STATE

Test.Name: Correct response on GetCapabilities and GetServises
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns GetServicesResponse message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported RecordingControl: supported Digest: supported

Test.Name: Correct response. Notification is received at first attempt (DynamicRecording is True)
Test.Description: Annex A.15: Created recording has not empty CompatibleSources list DynamicRecording is True Job Spare="1" for created recording Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - PUT JOB IN IDLE STATE
Test.Name: Incorrect CreateRecordingJobResponse
Test.Description: DUT sends CreateRecordingJobResponse for receiver instead of MediaProfile

STEP 19 - Delete recording 'recording001' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

Test.Name: PM without notification during waiting of Idle state event
Test.Description: Set OperationDelay to 60s Set SubscriptionTimeot to 60s Check that TT will wait events diring Operation delay time

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 31 - Check that the message with requested topic has been received so far Expected notification has not been received within predefined timeout "Operation Delay". The details of the expected notification are the following: topic="tns1:RecordingConfig/JobState", 'RecordingJobToken' Simple Item with value='job001' and 'State' Simple Item with value='Active' or 'PartiallyActive' STEP FAILED
